TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Utf8JsonReader extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供高性能的 API，以便提供对 UTF-8 编码 JSON 文本的只进和只读访问权限。

span.span: Provides a high-performance API for forward-only, read-only access to the UTF-8 encoded JSON text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Utf8JsonReader`在不使用缓存的情况下按顺序处理文本, 默认情况下严格遵循[JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259)。`Utf8JsonReader` processes the text sequentially with no caching and by default adheres strictly to the [JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259). 当`Utf8JsonReader`遇到无效的 JSON 时, 它会引发, 其中包含基本错误信息, 如行号和行中的字节位置。When `Utf8JsonReader` encounters invalid JSON, it throws a with basic error information like line number and byte position on the line. 由于此类型是 ref 结构, 因此不直接支持 async。Since this type is a ref struct, it doesn't directly support async. 但是, 它确实支持重入操作读取不完整的数据, 并在显示更多数据后继续读取。However, it does provide support for reentrancy to read incomplete data and to continue reading once more data is presented. 为了能够在读取或允许跳过注释时设置最大深度, 请创建一个实例并将其传递给读取器。To be able to set max depth while reading OR allow skipping comments, create an instance of and pass it to the reader.

param.span: 第一次调用构造函数时，它应反映默认状态；否则，它应从 的上一个实例捕获状态并传递回去。

span.span: On the first call to the constructor, it should reflect a default state; otherwise, it should capture the state from the previous instance instance of the and pass that back.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于此类型是一个 ref 结构, 因此它是一个仅堆栈类型, 并且 ref 结构的所有限制都适用于它。Since this type is a ref struct, it is a stack-only type, and all the limitations of ref structs apply to it. 这是构造函数接受的原因。This is the reason why the constructor accepts a .

public: property long BytesConsumed { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取 目前为止已为 的当前实例（带有给定 UTF-8 编码输入文本）使用的字节总数。

span.span: Gets the total number of bytes consumed by the so far for the current instance of the with the given UTF-8 encoded input text.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentDepth As Integer
public: property int CurrentDepth { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前标记的深度。

span.span: Gets the depth of the current token.
The depth of the current token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CurrentDepth`属性跟踪到目前为止处理的 JSON 文本中的嵌套对象/数组的递归深度。The `CurrentDepth` property tracks the recursive depth of the nested objects / arrays within the JSON text processed so far.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentState As JsonReaderState
public: property System::Text::Json::JsonReaderState CurrentState { System::Text::Json::JsonReaderState get(); };

summary.span: 获取 状态的当前快照，该状态必须由调用方捕获并传递回包含更多数据的 构造函数。

span.span: Gets the current snapshot of the state that must be captured by the caller and passed back in to the constructor with more data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 (ref 结构) 不同的是, 状态在异步/等待边界内可能会保留, 因此, 此类型需要在继续使用的新实例之前, 提供对更多数据的异步支持。 Unlike the , which is a ref struct, the state can survive across async/await boundaries, and hence this type is required to provide support for reading in more data asynchronously before continuing with a new instance of the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasValueSequence As Boolean
public: property bool HasValueSequence { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取值，该值指示要使用哪个 Value 属性来获取令牌值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates which Value property to use to get the token value.

value.span: 如果应使用来获取标记值, 则为。

span.span: if should be used to get the token value.
if should be used instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`HasValueSequence`为`false` ,则为空。If `HasValueSequence` is `false`, is empty. 因此, 请使用属性读取令牌值。Therefore, read the token value using the property. 对于中`ReadOnlySpan`的输入数据, 此始终返回`false`。For input data within a `ReadOnlySpan`, this always returns `false`. 对于中的输入数据`ReadOnlySequence`, 仅当令牌`true`值跨越多个段, 因此不能表示为范围时, 这种情况才会返回。For input data within a `ReadOnlySequence`, this only returns `true` if the token value straddles more than a single segment and hence can't be represented as a span.

Public ReadOnly Property ValueSequence As ReadOnlySequence(Of Byte)

summary.span: 获取最后一个处理的令牌的值作为输入有效负载的 ReadOnlySpan<byte> 切片。

span.span: Gets the value of the last processed token as a ReadOnlySpan<byte> slice of the input payload.

summary.span: 如果在 ReadOnlySequence<byte> 内提供 JSON，并且表示令牌值的切片适合单个段，则 包含切分的值，因为它可以表示为一个范围。

span.span: If the JSON is provided within a ReadOnlySequence<byte> and the slice that represents the token value fits in a single segment, then contains the sliced value since it can be represented as a span.

summary.span: 否则 包含令牌值。

span.span: Otherwise, contains the token value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为`false` ,`ValueSequence`则为空。If is `false`, `ValueSequence` is empty. 因此, 仅当`ValueSequence` 为时`true`才访问。Therefore, only access `ValueSequence` if is `true`. 否则, 必须从访问令牌值。Otherwise, the token value must be accessed from .
